statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -6 \\ -3 \\ -6 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -5 \\ 2 \\ -5 \\ -6 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -2 \\ -4 \\ -3 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 15 \\ -12 \\ 12 \\ 12 \\ 9 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} -10 \\ 14 \\ 1 \\ 0 \\ -6 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent or linearly independent.

answer.p: The vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -6 \\ -3 \\ -6 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -5 \\ 2 \\ -5 \\ -6 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -2 \\ -4 \\ -3 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 15 \\ -12 \\ 12 \\ 12 \\ 9 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} -10 \\ 14 \\ 1 \\ 0 \\ -6 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent .
